author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: Ridiculous Rally on $ZEC. What goes 10x in a month for no fundamental reason beside KOL shilling must come back down. Temu $XMR is trading at multi Billions in MC and flipped even $XMR. One of the easiest shorts in a while. Very close to the top here at 410. Don't roundtrip.
